meaning: evening, twilight, season's end, livelihood, make a living, spend time

onyomiExamples.meaning: year-end gift, end of the year, year end

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to get dark, to grow dark, to end (of a day, year, season, etc.), to come to an end, to close, to be sunk in (e.g. despair), to be lost in (e.g. thought), to be overcome with
to live, to get along, to spend (time)
